intro: Halgania rigida, commonly known as the rigid halgania, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. Its small, yellowish flowers are arranged in dense clusters, typical of the daisy family. Halgania rigida is adapted to survive in harsh, dry environments, making it a resilient species in its native habitat.
